¶ Setup

¶ Quickstart

# install globally
npm install -g vuepress

# create a markdown file
echo "# Hello VuePress!" > index.md

# start writing
vuepress

¶ Inside an Existing Project

# install as a dependency
npm install -D vuepress

# create a docs directory
mkdir docs
# create a markdown file
echo "# Hello VuePress!" > docs/index.md

Add scripts to package.json:

{
  "scripts": {
    "docs:dev": "vuepress dev docs",
    "docs:build": "vuepress build docs"
  }
}

Start writing:

npm run docs:dev

To generate static assets, run:

npm run docs:build

By default the built files will be in .vuepress/dist. The files can be deployed to any static file server. See Deployment Guide for guides on deploying to popular services.
